data.message: It is 2017!!  Why are you still using the R word in your lyrics??? Dont get me wrong, i have been a fan since the beginning. Im just hurt and confused. 😢

replies.message: Em always has and always will say whatever he wants

James Richard yeah....i know, you are right. 😢 I always chalked it up to it being a part of the times. You cant watch a movie from the early 2000s and prior without hearing that term being used in a derogatory way. I was just shocked that by now he hasn’t realized how hurtful that term is. It made me cry, literally.  I wish SNL would have at least muted it.
